content:
Get started with key Service Cloud tools that help you track and anticipate customer issues, boost agent productivity, and honor service-level agreements.

Optimize Setup with the Service Setup Assistant to create a work-ready service app for your team.
Configure General Support Settings for Service Cloud to set up business hours and support holidays in Salesforce and update case management settings.
Set Up and Manage Cases in Service Cloud as they are highly customizable records that agents and supervisors use to track and resolve customer issues.
Set Up Service-Level Agreements in Service Cloud with service contracts, entitlements, milestones, and assets.
Let Customers Create Contact Requests by giving them a form to complete to ask support to contact them. Then, route contact requests to agents in the Service Console.
Access Service Cloud on Mobile Devices with the Salesforce mobile app or use the offline-first Field Service mobile app for appointment scheduling and inventory management.
Service Cloud Functionality with My Service Journey (Beta) delivers instant, personalized service and support to your customers.

Set Up Routing and Rules in Service Cloud
Add Service Cloud Channels
Create a Knowledge Base with Salesforce Knowledge
title: Setting up Service Cloud Basics
